title: Champion icons in Collection are all missing
body:
All of the champion icons are missing in my Champions list. This started in v.11 and I reported it back then. It's still there in v.12 unfortunately. I've done a "Full Repair" but it didn't help.

When I switch to Collections, I can see them displayed for just a split second before they all disappear. This is 100% reproducible for me.

replies.body: My guess is that you have a high resolution screen, correct? We are seeing that behavior on those screens, the source of the bug has been identified and we are working on a fix {{champion:74}}

Not super high, 2560x1440, but it's set to 150% DPI.

Just noticed that applying a filter that cuts the list down to less than a page makes the icons show up again. Glad you're able to reproduce!
